TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsVolatile extends System.Object
public ref class IsVolatile abstract sealed

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsVolatile` 是只能用在方法簽章的自訂修飾詞，表示它會將標示欄位是變動性。`IsVolatile` is used only in custom modifiers of method signatures to indicate that the field it marks is volatile. 中繼資料匯入一個或多個欄位標記為 volatile 任何編譯器必須使用加上的指示`volatile.`存取這類欄位。Any compiler that imports metadata with one or more fields marked as volatile must use instructions prefixed with `volatile.` to access such fields. 中的類別編譯器撰寫者僅供使用。The classes in are for compiler writers' use only. 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更預設行為不適用時，在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器，處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的自訂修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 編譯器可以套用的自訂修飾詞來方法、 參數和傳回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略的選擇性修飾詞。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. C + + 編譯器可以發出來描述如何 byte，應該要視為 JIT 編譯器以 c + + 與不相容的方式處理位元組中預設的自訂修飾詞。A C++ compiler could emit a custom modifier to describe how a byte should be treated in cases where the JIT compiler treats bytes in a manner that is not compatible with C++ by default. 您可以發出自訂修飾詞至中繼資料，使用下列技巧：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法類別如， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`和`modreq`，然後將組合至檔案最[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
